comment: Takes forever to put in all of your grades. All grades will not be in until the end of the semester, so do not expect to know how you are doing in the class before midterms or the final exam. Take someone else if you can.

He is a hard grader. He also waits until the last week to grade anything. It was awful. I didn't know what my grade was until finals week. But, since he took forever to grade things, he reopened all the assignments for us to redo if we wanted. Make sure your drawings are correct. He is a harsh grader. His lectures are worthless, only reads slides

He was harsh on grading, and it took a long time for him to grade assignments. His lectures were wonderful and it seemed as though he genuinely just wanted to have us learn SOLIDWORKS. Always seemed willing to help students whether it be during office hours or in class, but like I said, his grading is kinda tough.

comment: Tough grader that doesn't put grades in right away, so it is hard to know you grade throughout the class. He is a nice guy but can go too much into detail. Spends a lot of time on hand drawings and looks for things very specifically. Very particular on what is being graded. Available and able to answer any questions pretty well.

He is a really tough grader, and makes it difficult to make a 90 or higher on homework assignments, and eventually the poor grades start to add up. However, the multiple choice tests and quizzes are pretty simple and straightforward.
